%{
#include "ex3a.tab.h" /* Header generated by Yacc/Bison */
%}
%%
"=" { printf("\nOperator is EQUAL"); return '='; }
"+" { printf("\nOperator is PLUS"); return '+'; }
"-" { printf("\nOperator is MINUS"); return '-'; }
"/" { printf("\nOperator is DIVISION"); return '/'; }
"*" { printf("\nOperator is MULTIPLICATION"); return '*'; }
[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]* { printf("\nIdentifier is %s", yytext); return ID; }
[ \t]+ { /* ignore whitespace */ }
. { return yytext[0]; }
\n { return 0; }
%%
int yywrap() {
 return 1;
}
